string.value: You have something you need to tell #p1040001#, who is guarding the #b#m106000300##k. Go see #b#p1040001##k.

#p1040001# says that there are problems at the moment but that the Perion Guards are always in need of good people. He asks if you could help since you look pretty strong. Hmm...what should you do? Talk to #b#p1013000##k about it.
#p1013000# says that helping people is always a good thing to do.
Hello, you're Evan right? #p1040000# tells me that you're pretty strong. Are you busy? No no, this has nothing to do with the puppets.
The #m102000000# Guards are always short-handed. We would love to have you join the #b#m102000000# Guards so that you can help us maintain security#k
The work isn't too difficult. It's just clearing up the area near #m102000000# so that beginner adventurers don't get hurt. What do you think?
#b(This is sure to interfere with your training. Will #p1013000# agree to do it? Talk to #p1013000#.)#k
Eh? You're going to refuse without even thinking about it? The pay isn't much but there is a lot of pride that comes with it...
What is it, master? What?! You're thinking about joining the #m102000000# Guards? What do the Guards to anyway?\r\n#b#L0#(You explain the Guards' job briefly.)#l\n#k
Oh! Helping people is a good thing! Heroes shouldn't refuse such a request! Training is important but that doesn't mean we should ignore people in need! Great idea! Let's join the Guards!
Well... Think about it carefully and let me know whether you want to join the Guards or not.
